author: joshd4078
content: Quick reminder to all <@&857649635274915900>. You **MUST** be posting, at a minimum, bi-weekly development updates. These are not only a requirement of your stipend and fellowship, but they are helpful to practice your technical writing skills, conveying your ideas to others, and allowing others to find information about the topics you are working on.
